ing: 1 (5.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1/2 cup powdered chocolate drink mix (such as NesquikÂ®)
des: "A great hot, chocolaty drink for wintertime using chocolate pudding mix, cinnamon, and more. Great for gift giving. Mix 1/4 cup mix with 1 cup of boiling water. Top off with whipped topping and sprinkle with cinnamon. Enjoy!"
ins: Pulse powdered milk, pudding mix, chocolate drink mix, powdered creamer, confectioners' sugar, cocoa powder, and cinnamon together in a food processor until blended.
